mapper.select: SELECT * FROM brand INNER JOIN user ON brand.user_id = user.id WHERE brand.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM brand INNER JOIN user ON brand.user_id = user.id ORDER BY brand.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO brand(name,user_id, url, number, info) VALUES(#{name},#{userId}, #{url}, #{number}, #{info})
mapper.update: UPDATE brand SET user_id=#{userId}, name = #{name}, number = #{number}, url = #{url}, info = #{info}
